official_title: A bill to provide the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare with the authority to make grants to States and local communities to pay for the cost of eye examination programs to detect glaucoma for the elderly.

summary.text: Provides the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare with the authority to make grants to States and local communities to pay for the costs of eye examination programs to detect glaucoma for the elderly. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this act.

titles.title: A bill to provide the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare with the authority to make grants to States and local communities to pay for the cost of eye examination programs to detect glaucoma for the elderly.
